H0.text: Michelangelo Merisi (or Amerighi) is the birth name of which artist. Michelangelo Buonarroti

H1.text: Michelangelo Merisi (or Amerighi) is the birth name of which artist. Tintoretto

H2.text: Michelangelo Merisi (or Amerighi) is the birth name of which artist. Gian Lorenzo Bernini

H3.text: Michelangelo Merisi (or Amerighi) is the birth name of which artist. Caravage

A4.text: Michelangelo Merisi da Caravaggio (also Michele Angelo Merigi or Amerighi da Caravaggio; 29 September 1571 â€“ 18 July 1610), known mononymously as Caravaggio, was an Italian painter active in Rome for most of his artistic life.
